name: OpalFacts
0:
”Alexa, open opal facts”
”Alexa, launch opal facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: opal facts
des: Opal facts allows people of all ages to learn new things about opals and geology. These majestic stones are more than meets the eye and the world deserves to know what makes them truly beautiful.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
